mapper.select: select FRCS_NO from FRANCHISE where FRCS_STS_CD != 'FRST04'

select r.RY_CLM_YM, r.FRCS_NO, r.RY_TOTAL_AMT, r.RY_STATUS_YN, r.RY_PAY_DT, r.RY_FRCS_FEE_AMT, r.RY_ORDER_AMT, r.RY_NPMNT_AMT, r.RY_OVRINT_AMT, r.RY_ROYALTY_AMT, f.FRCS_NM, (select count(*) from ROYALTY where FRCS_NO = r.FRCS_NO and RY_NPMNT_AMT > 0) as accNpmntCnt from ROYALTY r, FRANCHISE f where r.FRCS_NO = f.FRCS_NO and r.RY_CLM_YM = #{viewDate}

select RY_CLM_YM as YM, (RY_FRCS_FEE_AMT + RY_ORDER_AMT+ RY_OVRINT_AMT + RY_ROYALTY_AMT) as TOTAL, RY_STATUS_YN as STATUS from ROYALTY where FRCS_NO = #{crrFrcsNo} and RY_CLM_YM < #{viewDate} and (RY_STATUS_YN = 'N' or RY_PAY_DT > TO_DATE(#{viewDate}|| '-15')) order by RY_CLM_YM desc

select fod.PRDCT_NM as name, sum(fod.FRCS_ORDER_QY) as qty, sum(fod.FRCS_ORDER_COST) as price from FRCS_ORDER fo, FRCS_ORDER_DETAIL fod, PRODUCT p where fo.FRCS_ORDER_NO = fod.FRCS_ORDER_NO(+) and fo.FRCS_NO = fod.FRCS_NO(+) and fod.PRDCT_NO = p.PRDCT_NO and fo.FRCS_ORDER_TYPE_CD = 'FODST02' and fo.FRCS_NO = #{crrFrcsNo} and TO_CHAR(fo.FRCS_ORDER_DT, 'yyyy-MM') = #{viewDate} group by fod.PRDCT_NM
select * from ROYALTY where FRCS_NO = #{crrFrcsNo} and RY_CLM_YM = #{viewDate}
